about_the_game:
This DLC provides a Class One Silicon Filter module for mining. This filters out silicon from asteroid mining results (regardless of mining beam class) giving higher yields of other minerals.

As such it would only be of interest to established players, and has been added by request.
detailed_description:
This DLC provides a Class One Silicon Filter module for mining. This filters out silicon from asteroid mining results (regardless of mining beam class) giving higher yields of other minerals.

As such it would only be of interest to established players, and has been added by request.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Dual Core, 2Ghz
  • Graphics: Intel HD 5000, AMD A8
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Quad Core, 3-4Ghz
  • Graphics: AMD 6970, NVIDIA GTX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

This filters out silicon from asteroid mining results (regardless of mining beam class) giving higher yields of other minerals.
